snippet: CBS is betting that the free-wheeling spirit and eclectic playlist that made the Boston station popular from 1968 through the late 1980s will resonate with a new generation of listeners.
abstract: CBS is trying to make its WBCN Boston progressive rock radio station popular again, hoping its free-wheeling spirit and eclectic playlist that made it popular from 1968 through the late 1980s will resonate with a new generation of listeners; station is broadcast on HD, which broadcasters are cautious about, as format requires expensive radio.
lead_paragraph: CBS is betting that the free-wheeling spirit and eclectic playlist that made the Boston station popular from 1968 through the late 1980s will resonate with a new generation of listeners.

headline.seo: WBCN Progressive Rock Station Returns on HD
headline.main: Progressive Rock Station, WBCN, Returns on HD
headline.print_headline: Progressive Rock Station, WBCN, Returns on HD
